actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to designate the United States Courthouse located at 125 Bull Street, Savannah, Georgia, and associated structures, as the Tomochichi Federal Judicial Center.

summary.text: Designates the United States Courthouse located at Wright Square, 125 Bull Street, Savannah, Georgia, as the Tomochichi Federal Judicial Center. Applies such designation to any construction or adaptation of any building that is: (1) occupied by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Georgia; and (2) adjacent to or connected with that Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Courthouse located at 125 Bull Street, Savannah, Georgia, and associated structures, as the Tomochichi Federal Judicial Center.
